channel.title: Website developing
channel.description:
Well yeah .. while browsing some rsps, i definitely look on the website graphics..thats the time when i was inspired to do html coding. Well i practiced html for 2 weeks...learned html, css, js jquery and stuff, hyperlinks and more...
Some of the websites i make...i just use free domain.. i publish them just to see what it really looks like in the browser when some other people browse them.
the websites i developed ( If you will really see, they are not that really cool and stuff.) mcmarvelheroes.allalla.com http://zpvp.neq3.com/ - broken
and my project:
[img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/4540/site1z.png[/img]
[img]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/6373/site2l.png[/img]
Well yeah...still trying to learn html deeper,
If you need help in making a simple website for your server..maybe i can help you .i can make a html5 and css3 (responsive) website for your server. just reply your skype username so that i can add you
*well yeah im not here to show off or something..i just wanna try to help some people around so that i can enhance my skill. thanks for understanding ^_^ *the project i showed here is for AOC-REALm .a 317 server. well its released but i think its still in beta..owner needs to fix lots of stuff ^_^ *template used: zerofour

item.title: Website developing
item.dc:creator: @xnovamanx xnovamanx
item.description:
@xnovamanx wrote:

Ruby:

Write your own rather than taking other peoples work and editing that, that gives us an idea of how we can help you then.

hmm…yeah …ill start to write my own html site… ima learn how to add modules …thanks for the advice

Read full topic
